# oras

An R wrapper to the [oras](https://oras.land) cli.

## Quickstart


```r
install_github("cboettig/oras")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
write.csv(mtcars, "mtcars.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(oras)
```

```{r}
oras_login()
```

```{r}
oras_push("ghcr.io/cboettig/content-store/mtcars:v1", "mtcars.csv")
```


```{r include = FALSE}
unlink("mtcars.csv")
```
